name: Miolhr Cyan Sims Edition
description:
Coming to Steam

NEW UPDATE  (Update 0.1)!!! 

Miolhr.com (Update Notes)

Story

Explore the world of Miolhria like never before! Talk to the people here find your counterpart, purchase a home and design it the way you want! Find the perfect pet and find the job of your dreams while exploring the world and its many locations.

Basics and Gameplay

Miolhr SIMS Edition which wraps Miolhr the game into a SIMS game. This takes so much from our current game and Sims 1. 

This includes 24 Miolhrians (NPC's to interact with) 

50 pets to obtain, 

8 jobs you can obtain, 

11 homes you can buy and others you can stay in,

tons of bikes for traveling and so much more. 

1000+ Items, Clothing and Tools you can use on your journey! 

30+ Quest you can do for Characters or your job! 

You can play the field, date, or marry in our world. 

Not only this but go to Battle Events, bet, gamble at Pop n Slots or even compete!

This is a Sims game about survival. 

COMING SOON! 

Update 1.(0)

(12/10/22)
